segments.text: Almost ready . I am making a double check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is cold on the mountain . Have you packed the windshelled clothes and bodywarmers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . And I have also packed two umbrellas just in case of raining .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are so thoughtful . Do you think our tent will be working well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I just bought it last year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about our mobile phones and cameras ? Did you charge them last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . We should tell our neighbour that they can call the police if some emergency happens to us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You think a lot , too .
segments.speaker: S2
